data.title: Divorced Director finds new girl to Marry
data.meta_description: Selva Raghavan Geetanjali Marriage June Sonia Agarwal Divorce: Divorced Director finds new girl to Marry
data.text:
Creative genius Selva Raghavan is all set to marry again. Divorcing actress Sonia Agarwal, theer were strong rumors about Selva eyeing upon heroines Colors Swathi and Andrea. But, he is in true love with a 23 year girl named Geetanjali who is now assisting Selva on a Tamil project.

‘I have found true love and it is bliss. I will be getting engaged to her shortly. Geetanjali is an angel who came into my life and set it right. I was going through bad times and was not able to concentrate on my work. Geetanjali pulled me out of this pit I had fallen into,’ said Selva who may have a low profile engagement ceremony soon followed by marriage this June. Theya re decided to make a public appearance soon at a live concert of Music Director Yuvan Shankar Raja. Let us hope that Geetanjali doesn’t run away like Sonia.
